abstracts.cdata!:
With this project, the country's
            railways seek to maintain their operational efficiency. They
            hope to accomplish this by filling critical staff positions
            through staffing and training programs. In addition, the
            project intends to finance technical assistance, training
            and spare parts in order to prevent deterioration of rail
            equipment and fixed installations.
